subject: Baseball
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Greinke’s remarkable streak of scoreless innings has come against mostly sub-par teams, but Orel Hershiser faced similarly poor opposition when he set the record of 59 innings in 1988.
snippet: Greinke’s remarkable streak of scoreless innings has come against mostly sub-par teams, but Orel Hershiser faced similarly poor opposition when he set the record of 59 innings in 1988.
